enchantment.minecraft.channeling.desc.re: Causes the Trident to summon lightning when striking a mob. Ignites attacked mobs.
enchantment.minecraft.fire_aspect.desc.r: Ignites attacked mobs. Usable as Flint and Steel when sneaking.
enchantment.minecraft.luck_of_the_sea.de: Increases the quality of fishing loot and decreases the time required for fish to bite.
advancements.adventure.two_birds_one_arr: Kill two Phantoms with one crossbow shot
enchantment.minecraft.bane_of_arthropods: Greatly increases damage dealt to and slows arthropods.
enchantment.minecraft.binding_curse.desc: Prevents you from unequipping the item.
enchantment.minecraft.blast_protection.d: Greatly decreases damage taken from explosions.
enchantment.minecraft.channeling.desc: Causes the Trident to summon lightning when striking a mob while it's thundering.
enchantment.minecraft.density.desc: Increases damage dealt per block fallen.
enchantment.minecraft.feather_falling.de: Greatly decreases damage taken from falling.
enchantment.minecraft.fire_protection.de: Greatly decreases damage taken from and time spent on fire.
enchantment.minecraft.impaling.desc: Greatly increases damage dealt to aquatic mobs.
enchantment.minecraft.infinity.desc: Causes normal arrows to not be consumed.
enchantment.minecraft.loyalty.desc: Causes the Trident to return to you upon landing.
enchantment.minecraft.luck_of_the_sea.de: Increases the quality of fishing loot.
enchantment.minecraft.lure.desc: Decreases the time required for fish to bite.
enchantment.minecraft.mending.desc: Causes experience orbs to repair the item.
enchantment.minecraft.multishot.desc: Causes three arrows to shoot instead of one.
enchantment.minecraft.piercing.desc: Causes projectiles to pierce through mobs and shields.
enchantment.minecraft.projectile_protect: Greatly decreases damage taken from projectiles.
enchantment.minecraft.protection.desc: Decreases damage taken from all sources.
enchantment.minecraft.riptide.desc: Allows you to launch yourself with the Trident when wet.
enchantment.minecraft.silk_touch.desc: Causes certain blocks to drop themselves.
enchantment.minecraft.smite.desc: Greatly increases damage dealt to undead.
enchantment.minecraft.soul_speed.desc: Increases movement speed on soul blocks.
enchantment.minecraft.sweeping_edge.desc: Increases damage dealt with sweeping attacks.
enchantment.minecraft.thorns.desc: Harms attackers when you take damage.
enchantment.minecraft.vanishing_curse.de: Causes the item to disappear on death.
enchantment.minecraft.wind_burst.desc: Causes smash attacks to launch you upward.
